task.title: How to Make Butter Pecan Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: Need a pick-me-up before grading/writing a paper? Try this Butter Pecan recipe!

ul.li: 1 Teaspoon of kosher salt, and an additional pinch

p.b: This recipe will make about 6 ½ cups (13 ½ cup servings).

step.cmd: Meltbutter in a medium skillet. Addpecans and 1 teaspoon of salt.
Cookover a medium-low heat until pecans are toasted and golden. Stirfrequently for about 6 to 8 minutes.
Removeskillet from the heat. Strain. Allow pecans to chill.
Combine milk, sugar, and a pinch of salt in a medium bowl. Using a hand mixture (on low) or whisk, beatuntil the sugar dissolves.
